Spinal muscular atrophy disease.Comment: There is some question as to whether Kennedy Syndrome is a synonym for SMA or whether it is a different disorder.
Spinal muscular atrophy disease.Definition: A group of disorders marked by progressive degeneration of motor neurons in the spinal cord resulting in weakness and muscular atrophy, usually without evidence of injury to the corticospinal tracts. Diseases in this category include Werdnig-Hoffmann disease and later onset SPINAL MUSCULAR ATROPHIES OF CHILDHOOD, most of which are hereditary (MeSH).
